attributes.action: Have you been involved in a RTA that was not your fault removed from insurance
attributes.background: There have been plenty of cases where a person or persons have been involved in a RTA that was not there fault and yet still penalised by the insurance companies by asking the question in the petition, there insurance goes up even though they have done nothing wrong and yet feel like there criminals

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
